frame.name: Memory
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame is concerned with <fen>Cognizer</fen>s remembering and forgetting mental <fen>Content</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">John</fex> <t>forgot</t> <fex name="Content">everything</fex> <fex name="Topic">about his uncle</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person whose mental <fen>Content</fen> is at issue.</def-root>

FE.name: Content
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Content</fen> is the mental content that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> retains or forgets.
<ex>Each student must be able to <t>recall</t> <fex name="Content">the whole paragraph</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject the <fen>Cognizer</fen> mental <fen>Content</fen> is about.
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">John</fex> <t>forgot</t> <fex name="Content">everything</fex> <fex name="Topic">about his uncle</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the actor of an action.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act whereby the <fen>Cognizer</fen> manages to remember or forget the <fen>Content</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> represents the consequences of the remembering or forgetting of the mental <fen>Content</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the amount of time for which the mental <fen>Content</fen> is remembered or forgotten.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is where the remembering or forgetting takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which the remembering or forgetting occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the remembering or forgetting of mental <fen>Content</fen> occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Experience
FE.definition: <def-root>An event (or period of time standing in for events) that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has experienced that leads to the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembering the <fen>Content</fen>. <ex>Then I <t>remembered</t> <fex name="Exp">from our summer together</fex> that he frowned on smoking.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The situation which surrounds a <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembering a <fen>Content</fen> or <fen>Topic</fen>.
<ex><fex name="cir">With the lights off</fex>, people can <t>remember</t> better.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: remember.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have in or be able to bring to one's mind (someone or something from the past)

lexUnit.name: memory.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the cognitive act of recalling an event or entity from the past

lexUnit.name: recollect.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: bring back to the level of conscious awareness

lexUnit.name: recollection.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or faculty of remembering
